name: Ext_R4B_ImagingStudy_se_laterality
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ImagingStudy.series.laterality for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ImagingStudy.series.laterality from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The laterality of the (possibly paired) anatomic structures examined. E.g., the left knee, both lungs, or unpaired abdomen. If present, shall be consistent with any laterality information indicated in ImagingStudy.series.bodySite.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.series.laterality` maps to R5 `ImagingStudy.series.laterality`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The laterality of the (possibly paired) anatomic structures examined. E.g., the left knee, both lungs, or unpaired abdomen. If present, shall be consistent with any laterality information indicated in ImagingStudy.series.bodySite.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.series.laterality` maps to R5 `ImagingStudy.series.laterality`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes describing body site laterality (left, right, etc.).
